message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to enhance your daily life with its unique features and high-quality materials. Given its exceptional value, I'm proposing a price of $120 for it. I believe this is a fair offer considering its worth to you. Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're providing with your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $95 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective and appreciate your willingness to meet halfway. In order to move forward, I would like to suggest a price of $100 for the product. I believe this offers a good balance between value and affordability. I look forward to your response.
